title: Fare War! $39+ O/W Flights on Southwest and United
text:
Home > Flight Deals > Fare War! $39+ O/W Flights on Southwest and United Fare War! $39+ O/W Flights on Southwest and United September 9, 2015 6:47pm by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff Tweet 
Major U.S. airlines Southwest and United have each posted competing systemwide sales, both promotions running through the fourth week in September and delivering discounted nonstop flights through the end of winter. In more detail, the sales end on September 24 and are applicable for travel during September 22 - March 3. Fares start at $39 one-way ($78 when booked round-trip). 
Blackout dates exclude travel during November 24, 25; November 28 - December 1; December 26 - 28; January 2, 3; Februa ... more 
Major U.S. airlines Southwest and United have each posted competing systemwide sales, both promotions running through the fourth week in September and delivering discounted nonstop flights through the end of winter. In more detail, the sales end on September 24 and are applicable for travel during September 22 - March 3. Fares start at $39 one-way ($78 when booked round-trip). 
Blackout dates exclude travel during November 24, 25; November 28 - December 1; December 26 - 28; January 2, 3; February 11, 15, or 16. EDITOR'S OVERVIEW Where to Book: The best prices were found for the travel window of these sales by using a flexible date search, which can be accessed through our flight comparison tool to the right. You can find these promotions on the Southwest and United sale pages. Pros: Able to plan travel way in advance. Cons:
